byline: Sabri Ben-Achour, Mark Garrison, Nick Blumberg, Judy Collins, Kai Ryssdal and Noel King
teaser: Tomorrow we’ll learn how many Americans were unemployed in April. Today, we explain what the rate at which Americans quit their jobs says about the labor market. On the web, GM and Mountain Dew have pulled ads perceived to be offensive. Were the ads the result of pressure to make a big, edgy splash; or weak vetting for digital ads; or possibly a more deliberate strategy?
